com.opendxl.databus.serialization.internal

Class LegacyMessageStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opendxl.databus.serialization.internal.LegacyMessageStructure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageStructure

    public class LegacyMessageStructure
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageStructure
    Represent a Legacy Message Structura based on JSON

    For example: {"headers":{"sourceId":"abc","tenantId":"TENANT10"}, "payloadBase64String":"wqFIb2xhISBIdWdvIGFxdcOtLg=="}
